original: @195b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @195b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra yo gi ni'i s'a dha nam /
analyzed: badzra yo gi ni'i s'a dha nam /
translated: Vajrayoginisādhana

original: bod skad du /🔽rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
analyzed: bod skad du / rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
translated: In Tibetan:🔽The Means of Attaining Vajrayoginī

original: rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor nang nam nyid gco //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor nang nam nyid gco //
translated: The yoga is the mandala itself.

original: khyod ni 'jig rten gsum gyi thig le ste //
analyzed: khyod ni 'jig rten gsum gyi thig le ste //
translated: You are the drop of the three worlds,

original: khyod ni sems can kun la phan par byed //
analyzed: khyod ni sems can kun la phan par byed //
translated: You are the one who benefits all sentient beings.

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Vajrayoginī.

original: aom a'a: h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ.🔽

original: dang por re zhig sngags pas sa phyogs gang yang rung bar bstan nas gang yang rung bar 'dug nas rdo rje rnal 'byor ma bsgom pa la brtson par bya ste //
analyzed: dang por re zhig sngags pas sa phyogs gang yang rung bar bstan nas gang yang rung bar 'dug nas rdo rje rnal 'byor ma bsgom pa la brtson par bya ste //
translated: First, the mantrin, having gone to any place, having sat down anywhere, should strive to meditate on Vajrayoginī.

original: de yang rang gi lta bar padma dmar po kha bye bar bsgoms la /
analyzed: de yang rang gi lta bar padma dmar po kha bye bar bsgoms la /
translated: Moreover, one should meditate on a red lotus in one’s heart,

original: de'i steng du shin tu dmar ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du shin tu dmar ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and on top of that, one should meditate on a sun maṇḍala, very red.

original: de'i steng du li khri'i mdog lta bu'i dbus su yi ge hrim hrim gnas pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas bsgoms so //
analyzed: de'i steng du li khri'i mdog lta bu'i dbus su yi ge hrim hrim gnas pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas bsgoms so //
translated: On top of that, in the center, the color of vermillion, one should meditate on the source of phenomena, which is the abode of the syllable hriṃ hriṃ.

original: de la gnas pa'i yi ge hri yongs su gyur ba las /
analyzed: de la gnas pa'i yi ge hri yongs su gyur ba las /
translated: From its complete transformation,

original: de'i steng du rje btsun rnal 'byor ma sku mdog ser mo //
analyzed: de'i steng du rje btsun rnal 'byor ma sku mdog ser mo //
translated: above it, is the Venerable Yoginī, yellow in color,

original: rang gi gri gug gis rang gi mgo bcad nas //
analyzed: rang gi gri gug gis rang gi mgo bcad nas //
translated: with her own flaying knife cutting off her own head,

original: rang gi lag pa g-yon pas gyen du brkyang ste /🔽bzung ba phyag g-yas pa'i gri gug dang bcas pa 'og tu brkyang ba /
analyzed: rang gi lag pa g-yon pas gyen du brkyang ste / bzung ba phyag g-yas pa'i gri gug dang bcas pa 'og tu brkyang ba /
translated: which she holds aloft with her left hand,🔽together with her right hand’s flaying knife extended downward.

original: gcer bu zhabs g-yas pa brkyang ba //
analyzed: gcer bu zhabs g-yas pa brkyang ba //
translated: She is naked, with her right leg extended

original: g-yon bskum pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon bskum pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: and the left drawn in.

original: mgrin pa bcad 'phro nas khrag gi rgyun 'dzag pa /
analyzed: mgrin pa bcad 'phro nas khrag gi rgyun 'dzag pa /
translated: A stream of blood flows from her severed neck

original: rang gi zhal du 'jug cing /
analyzed: rang gi zhal du 'jug cing /
translated: and enters her mouth.

original: gzhan gnyis gyen la log nas gnas pa //
analyzed: gzhan gnyis gyen la log nas gnas pa //
translated: The other two faces are inverted.

original: rnal 'byor gnyis kyi zhal su 'bab pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gnyis kyi zhal su 'bab pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on whichever face of the two yoginīs is facing.

original: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i logs dang nas gnas pa'i kha dog sngo bsangs la badzra warna ni ma dang / kha dog ser mo rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad ma'o //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i logs dang nas gnas pa'i kha dog sngo bsangs la badzra warna ni ma dang / kha dog ser mo rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad ma'o //
translated: On the right and left sides are the green Vajravarṇanī and the yellow Vajra Vairocanī.

original: g-yon dang rgyas kyi phyag gi gri gug dang bcas pa dang / g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i phyag thod pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon dang rgyas kyi phyag gi gri gug dang bcas pa dang / g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i phyag thod pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: with a flaying knife in the right and left hands,🔽and a skull bowl in the left and right hands.🔽The right foot is extended.

original: g-yas phyogs kyi zhabs g-yas pa brkyang ba /🔽g-yon phyogs kyi g-yon pa brgyad pa //
analyzed: g-yas phyogs kyi zhabs g-yas pa brkyang ba / g-yon phyogs kyi g-yon pa brgyad pa //
translated: The left foot is bent.

original: zhabs gzhan bskum pa /
analyzed: zhabs gzhan bskum pa /
translated: The other foot is drawn in.

original: thod pa dang mgo bos brgyan pa //
analyzed: thod pa dang mgo bos brgyan pa //
translated: It is adorned with skulls and heads.

original: yan lag rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: yan lag rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa /
translated: It is adorned with all the limb ornaments.

original: skra grol ba bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: skra grol ba bsam par bya'o //
translated: The hair is loose.

original: logs gnyis kyi dbus ma'i rnal 'byor ma shin tu 'jigs pa bsgom spar bya'o //
analyzed: logs gnyis kyi dbus ma'i rnal 'byor ma shin tu 'jigs pa bsgom spar bya'o //
translated: One should visualize the yoginī in the middle of the two sides, extremely terrifying.

original: de ni bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bsgom pa'o //
translated: That is the meditation.

original: mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: The praise is stated:🔽Having made a maṇḍala,

original: mandala byas nas nyi ma'i gzhi la gnas pa'i @196a * //
analyzed: mandala byas nas nyi ma'i gzhi la gnas pa'i @196a * //
translated: the source of phenomena is drawn on the sun base,

original: chos kyi 'byung gnas bris pa ni yi ge hr'i: dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'byung gnas bris pa ni yi ge hr'i: dang bcas pa'o //
translated: together with the syllable hrīḥ.

original: de nas sngon du bstan pa'i bsgoms pas rje btsun ma dbus su bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas sngon du bstan pa'i bsgoms pas rje btsun ma dbus su bsam par bya ste /
translated: Then, as previously explained, the visualized Venerable Lady is in the center.

original: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye /
analyzed: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye /
translated: oṃ sarva buddha dakiniye

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su mchod par bya'o //
translated: With this and other mantras, one should worship in the center of the source of phenomena.

original: phyi nas aargha dang / me tog dang / bdug sngos dang / dri la sogs pa rnams /🔽aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: phyi nas aargha dang / me tog dang / bdug sngos dang / dri la sogs pa rnams / aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Then, with argha, flowers, incense, perfume, and so on,

original: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis mchod par bya'o //
translated: one should worship with the mantra:🔽Oṃ sarva-buddha-ḍākinī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: phyis nas g-yon phyogs su /🔽aom badzra wa rna n'i ye h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: phyis nas g-yon phyogs su / aom badzra wa rna n'i ye h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Then, to the left,

original: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so //
translated: with the mantra: Oṃ vajra-vārāhīye hūṃ svāhā.

original: de nas g-yas phyogs su /🔽aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: de nas g-yas phyogs su / aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Then, to the right,

original: zhes bya ba 'dis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis so //
translated: with this mantra: Oṃ vajra-caurīye hūṃ svāhā.

original: de nas gzhan yang /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang /
translated: Then, again,

original: ae di ya na su la /
analyzed: ae di ya na su la /
translated: with the mantra: Eḍa-yā-na-su-la,

original: gi ri ka ma ka shi ri ha ha ta /
analyzed: gi ri ka ma ka shi ri ha ha ta /
translated: giri-ka-ma-ka-śiri-ha-ha-ta,

original: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis kyang mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis kyang mchod par bya'o //
translated: one should worship.

original: gzhan yang dharm'a sambha ga / nir ma ma h'a su kha /
analyzed: gzhan yang dharm'a sambha ga / nir ma ma h'a su kha /
translated: Again, with the mantra: Dharma-saṃbhagā, nir-ma-ma-hā-sukha,

original: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis kyang mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis kyang mchod par bya'o //
translated: one should worship.

original: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ya /🔽aom badzra wa rna n'i ye ;
analyzed: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ya / aom badzra wa rna n'i ye ;
translated: Oṃ sarva buddha dākinīye🔽Oṃ vajra varṇanīye

original: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra vairocanīye hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: zhes bya ba'i sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bzas pa byas na bgegs thams cad skrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bzas pa byas na bgegs thams cad skrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites this approach mantra one hundred thousand times, all obstructors will be expelled.

original: 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na grong khyer skrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na grong khyer skrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites it three hundred thousand times, the city will be expelled.

original: 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas na grong rdal skrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas na grong rdal skrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites it four hundred thousand times, the town will be expelled.

original: 'bum phrag lnga bzlas na gang 'dod pa de 'grub par byed do //🔽chu mdo' ma /
analyzed: 'bum phrag lnga bzlas na gang 'dod pa de 'grub par byed do // chu mdo' ma /
translated: If one recites it five hundred thousand times, one will accomplish whatever one wishes.🔽at a riverbank,

original: dur khrod dam /
analyzed: dur khrod dam /
translated: in a charnel ground,

original: shing gcig gam /
analyzed: shing gcig gam /
translated: under a solitary tree,

original: lha'i khang ba 'am /
analyzed: lha'i khang ba 'am /
translated: in a temple,

original: ma mo'i khang ba'am /
analyzed: ma mo'i khang ba'am /
translated: in a mother's house,

original: yul gyi mthar bsgrub par bya'o //🔽skra grol ba /
analyzed: yul gyi mthar bsgrub par bya'o // skra grol ba /
translated: or in a border region.🔽One should meditate with loose hair,

original: gcer bur gyur pa /
analyzed: gcer bur gyur pa /
translated: naked,

original: dogs pa thams cad spangs te smra ba bcad la bsgom par bya'o //🔽aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i /
analyzed: dogs pa thams cad spangs te smra ba bcad la bsgom par bya'o // aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i /
translated: having abandoned all fears, and observing silence.🔽Oṃ sarva buddha dākinīye

original: aom badzra wa rna n'i ye /
analyzed: aom badzra wa rna n'i ye /
translated: Oṃ vajra varṇanīye

original: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye /
analyzed: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye /
translated: Oṃ vajra vairocanīye |🔽Gandhaṃ puṣpam

original: gandham pushpam / ba lingam grihna ma ma raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
analyzed: gandham pushpam / ba lingam grihna ma ma raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
translated: balim gṛhṇa māṃ rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ.

original: dpal lha lcam lakshm'i ka ras mdzad pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal lha lcam lakshm'i ka ras mdzad pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Yoginī composed by Śrī Lakṣmīnkara is complete.
